full_summary:
# Tender Notice

## Title
Subscription to the Pharma Intelligence Center - Drugs Database & Trials Intelligence

## Document Reference
PW-22-01012474

## Tender Status
**Expired**

## Date and Time of Tender Closing
2022-11-18T14:00:00

## Description
The Patented Medicine Prices Review Board (PMPRB) requires subscription to a comprehensive database of pharmaceutical information, including prices, reimbursement regimes, and international trends. This database will be used to support the PMPRB's price review process, develop strategic advice, and report on national and international trends.

## Features of the Subscription
- Access to the Pharma Intelligence Center's Drugs Database and Trials Intelligence.
- Real-time updates on international pricing and reimbursement regimes/policies and trends.
- Ability to analyze and filter data to support the PMPRB's needs.
- Regular technical support and assistance.

## Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

## Regions
This tender is limited to Canada. The work will be carried out within the National Capital Region (NCR).

## Entity Information
- Contracting Entity: Patented Medicine Prices Review Board (PMPRB)
- Address: 333 Laurier Avenue West, Suite 1400, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 1C1, Canada
- Contact Person: Nadia Laneve
- Email: nadia.laneve@pmprb-cepmb.gc.ca
- Phone: 613-851-8316

## Attachments
The tender package, including the terms and conditions, is available for download [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/04/318e0b1bb8316b24c0ce478c75e3b287/sn22005_acan_globaldata_eng.pdf) (English) and [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/04/fa6c52bf04341bf6746b4dc3ea922a0b/sn22005_pac_globaldata_fr.pdf) (French). 

Please note the tender closing date has passed. However, the above information is provided for public information purposes only.  [A]#MarcusD@fedtrade Admin Section# 2024-06-07
